1. Eating one ultra-processed food 'reduces life expectancy by nine minutes each meal'  Surrey Live
  2. Exact number of minutes you lose of life every time you eat a hotdog  Daily Mail
  3. Ultra-processed foods are making us old beyond our years, study warns  Medical Xpress
  4. Popular food item eaten by millions can 'take nine minutes off your life' every time you eat it  The Mirror US
  5. Ultra-processed foods may make you age faster  Gujarat Samachar

item.title: Slow-Wave Sleep Optimizes Memory Formation - Neuroscience News
item.description:
1. Slow-Wave Sleep Optimizes Memory Formation  Neuroscience News
